subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous queen of Rajasthan is known for her valour and leadership?
question_hi: राजस्थान के महिले के साथ कोई लड़की जो भीमी के लिए सौरंभ और नामावना के लिए किया गया है।
explanation_en: Rani Karnawati is known for leading the Chittor Fort siege and fighting against the Sultan of Gujarat. She is considered a symbol of bravery and leadership.
